pullRequest.title: Add buttons to select the file types ignored on Break
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds buttons to allow the user to select the file types he wants to ignore.
Initial implementation for: #1276

nodes.bodyText: Should be removed, not actually used.
We should add these as an internal API for now.
We should be consistent with naming, either Js or JavaScript (former?).
Might worth adding a separator before this one and before the scope button, as they have opposite behaviour.
This should be replaced with the use of the existing option (BreakpointsParam#isInScopeOnly()), otherwise we might end up with conflicting/misleading state, one set to break and the other unset.
This should not be needed, per previous comment about the existing option.
Extract a variable for the row.
Should call discardAllEdits() after setting each value.
Typo in multimedia (same in the default constant).

Start with lower case.
Technically this is no longer just about ignore files, scope button is included.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -887,6 +888,10 @@ brk.optionspanel.option.breakmode.dual.label	= Separate Request and Response but
 brk.optionspanel.option.breakmode.simple.label	= Single combined button
 brk.optionspanel.option.confirmDropMessage.label = Confirm drop trapped message
 brk.optionspanel.option.inScopeOnly.label = Only break on messages in scope
+brk.optionspanel.option.ShowBreakFilteringButtons.label = Show buttons to filter the type of requests that ZAP should break on

@@ -887,6 +888,10 @@ brk.optionspanel.option.breakmode.dual.label	= Separate Request and Response but
 brk.optionspanel.option.breakmode.simple.label	= Single combined button
 brk.optionspanel.option.confirmDropMessage.label = Confirm drop trapped message
 brk.optionspanel.option.inScopeOnly.label = Only break on messages in scope
+brk.optionspanel.option.ShowBreakFilteringButtons.label = Show buttons to filter the type of requests that ZAP should break on
+brk.optionspanel.option.javascriptUrlRegex.label = Javascript url regex:

nodes.bodyText:
This should be moved to zap/src/main/dist/license/.
Better have this as plain text (per file extension).
To be easier/clear it should be enumerated which icons/files apply to which licenses (and link to the icon set). Was any icon changed?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@ +
Icons made by Smashicons from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY

nodes.bodyText:
The terms also require linking from the about dialogue:
https://icons8.com/license
https://icons8.crisp.help/en/article/where-do-i-set-the-link-irwkfh/
Desktop software — please put the link in the About dialog
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@ +
Icons made by Smashicons from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY
+ +JavaScript icon icon by Icons8

nodes.bodyText: Should be removed, not actually used.
Not needed, the state of these buttons does not need to be reset.
I wonder if this one would be better in the Display panel, this is closely related to "Show break buttons", we can then disable this if the option is set to "Only in the toolbar".

add buttons in break panel to select types of requests intercepted

Signed-off-by: Diogo Silva <diogo.m.r.silva@tecnico.ulisboa.pt>
